```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
source("utils.R")
library(jsonlite)
library(flexdashboard)
areas <- getKnownAreas()
resorts <- areas$resorts
area <- lapply(resorts, getAreaData)
weather <- lapply(resorts, getCurrentWeather)
```
